    • Constructor Detail

      • Standalone

        protected Standalone(Supplier<Ignitable> _supplier,
                     String _name,
                     String _description,
                     boolean _showBanner,
                     URL _bannerFont,
                     List<Class<? extends Enum<? extends Parameter>>> _parameters,
                     String[] _arguments,
                     Consumer<String> _console,
                     BiFunction<String,Object[],String> _consoleFormat,
                     boolean _verbose)
        Standalone constructor
        Parameters:
        _supplier - ignitable supplier
        _name - optional name for the banner
        _description - optional description for the help
        _showBanner - flag to determine if the name is informed should show the banner
        _bannerFont - banner font
        _parameters - List of parameters enum to parse
        _arguments - arguments to use
        _console - console to use
        _consoleFormat - console format
        _verbose - console verbose enabler

      • Standalone

                     Console _console)

        _supplier - ignitable supplier
        _name - optional name for the banner
        _description - optional description for the help
        _showBanner - flag to determine if the name is informed should show the banner
        _bannerFont - banner font
        _parameters - List of parameters enum to parse
        _arguments - arguments to use
        _console - console to use

      • startup

        protected Standalone startup()
        Override this method to implement special tasks for startup If this instance implements Runnable, then the default implementation will call Runnable::run
        Returns:
        itself
        See Also:
        Runnable

      • shutdown

        protected Standalone shutdown()
        Override this method to implement special tasks for graceful shutdown If this instance implements Closeable, then the default implementation will call Closeable::close
        Returns:
        itself
        See Also:
        Closeable

      • addShutdownHook

        protected Standalone addShutdownHook()
        Registers the shutdown hook to perform a graceful shutdown by calling the Standalone::shudtdown method
        Returns:
        The same instance provided

      • printBanner

        protected Standalone printBanner()
        Prints banner into CONSOLE logger at INFO level if name is informed
        Returns:
        The same instance provided

      • registerStandalone

        protected Standalone registerStandalone()
        Assigns standalone if possible
        Returns:
        The same instance provided

      • ignite

        public Standalone ignite()
        Call this method to ignite the standalone application this method will:
        • Get standalone instance
        • Register shutdown hook
        • Call startup
        Returns:
        Standalone instance
        See Also:
        Standalone

      • extinguish

        public void extinguish(int _exitCode)
        Call this method to programatically shutdown() the application.
        Parameters:
        _exitCode - exit code to use when shutdown application this method force current jvm execution termination
        Since:
        1.1.0
        See Also:
        shutdown(), System.exit(int)

      • selfExtinguish

        public static void selfExtinguish(int _returnCode)
        Extinguish the latest Standalone instance created. If no instance exist or has been created no action is done.
        Parameters:
        _returnCode - return code to pass to extinguish method
        See Also:
        extinguish(int)

      • getParametersClasses

        public static List<Class<? extends Enum<? extends Parameter>>> getParametersClasses()
        Return the list of parameter classes provided during creation of the latest standalone instantiation or empty list if no parameters added or no standalone instantiated
